about_the_game: You are the mercenary with investigative and war assignments, belonging to the second expedition team, sent to a mysterious archipelago following the disappearance of the first expedition team called "Torch". The task of the expeditions is to shed light on strange phenomena of genetic mutations captured by drones. Upgrade your character's skills, forge alliances, trade, build your base and more in this top-down 2D RPG / action game. plan well your moves, your movements and journeys, your special operations, your assaults on enemy factions, your finances, your resources. Hunt and get food to survive, fight in a casual game world where every action can be played in different ways. A dynamic weather system and day / night alternation will allow you to experience the game in a different way, the character's skills can be increased, the hunger / thirst system will make the survival experience more stimulating but without making the gameplay frustrating. Trading with characters can be more or less favorable depending on your skills as a merchant. You can craft ammo items and cook food, get into expedition vehicles to take refuge during a storm or while under siege by a rival faction and far from your base. Be careful when entering a building, it may be full of hostile creatures. Manage your resources well, each mission you take on may require different equipment. Go around looking for resources in containers like shelves or airdrops, then resell what you don't need and use or keep the rest in personal containers. Talk to a variety of characters, some of whom will assign you missions. Be careful not to get overwhelmed by the enemies! you could get caught, robbed and end up in a prison of an enemy faction!

content_descriptors.notes: There are: Nudity of the main character (possibility of undressing), violence, explicit scenes of violence, firearms, firefights, fights, looting defeated enemies, blood and monstrous fantasy creatures (e.g. zombies), bad language.
